Package com.wessles.MERCury.opengl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animated
    An abstraction for objects that are animated.
    Batcher
    An abstraction for batchers.
    Graphics
    An abstraction for all graphics.
    Textured
    An abstraction for objects that are textured.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    An easy to use animation class.
    Color
    A class for Color, that will hold the three values; r, g, and b, and will darken, brighten, multiply, etc.
    Shader
    An object version of shaders.
    Texture
    An object version of a texture.
    VAOBatcher
    A very simple batcher.
    VAOGraphics
    An object used for graphics.
    VAOUtils
    A utilities class for vertex array objects.
